name: h3
description: The 2026 Louisville Slugger Atlas Drop 5 USSSA Baseball Bat is engineered for players seeking a balanced swing and enhanced performance. With its USSSA 1.15 BPF certification, this bat features a 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter, offering a substantial sweet spot thanks to the innovative XPND End Cap. The SL Hyper Superlight Alloy construction ensures a light swing with maximum pop, while the Pro Design Knob Taper provides additional leverage during your swing. Complemented by a stylish grey, teal, and white colorway, the bat also includes a Premium LS Pro Comfort Grip for superior control and comfort. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included.
